instructions:
In a 4 quart pot sauté the chopped onion and the Kielbasa pieces in olive oil for about 7 minutes with the
lid slightly ajar. Add the remaining ingredients and simmer with the lid slightly ajar for 15 to 20 minutes or
until the cabbage is at the desired tenderness. This is a simple but tasty peasant food. Serve with crusty
bread, cheese and fruit. Makes about 2 1/2 quarts.
ingredients: 1/2 lb Kielbasa, quartered and sliced 1/4 inch
3 cans (10 1/2 oz ea) Campbell's chicken broth
1 lb young cabbage, coarsely chopped 1/4 by 1 1/2 inch
name: Cabbage Soup
creator: Mary and Jim Decker
